comments:
3.3M6

If a contribution to Universal Intro specifies an invalid path an NPE is generated instead of displaying Welcome. This should be fixed for 3.3 because one bad contribution should not take down the entire Intro view.

To reproduce:

Use the PDE wizard to create a universal intro contribution.
Change the path name in sample.xml to "Overview" i.e. Capitalize the first letter.
Launch a new runtime workbench.

Result is an NPE

java.lang.NullPointerException

I was incorrect when I said that this was in M6, it is a recent regression. In any case it's fixed.
